Description: Educational JSON for standard Autodesk Inventor 2026 AddIn template (TestAddIn). This JSON includes full explanations of each part, references, COM dependencies, and post-build actions.

Debug.Description: Debug configuration: standard memory alignment and code analysis rules.

Release.Description: Release configuration: optimized build without debug symbols.

Source.Name: StandardAddInServer.cs
Source.Description: Primary AddIn server class. Implements Inventor.ApplicationAddInServer interface.

Fields.Name: m_inventorApplication
Fields.Description: Holds reference to running Inventor application instance. Used to interact with Inventor API.

Methods.Name: Activate
Methods.Description: Called by Inventor when the AddIn is loaded. Initializes internal objects, events, and commands.

Methods.Name: Deactivate
Methods.Description: Called when AddIn is unloaded. Releases resources, sets application object to null, and runs garbage collection.

Methods.Name: ExecuteCommand
Methods.Description: Obsolete method for executing a command by ID. Modern AddIns should use ControlDefinition objects instead.

Methods.Name: Automation
Methods.Description: Optional property to expose a custom API to external programs. Returns null by default.

Source.Name: AssemblyInfo.cs
Source.Description: Contains assembly metadata for the AddIn.

Attributes.Description: Assembly attributes provide metadata and COM GUID for registration.

None.Name: TestAddIn.X.manifest
None.Description: Windows application manifest for COM registration and runtime settings.

None.Name: Autodesk.TestAddIn.Inventor.addin
None.Description: Inventor AddIn registration XML. Contains ClassId, assembly name, load options, and version compatibility.

None.Name: Readme.txt
None.Description: Optional readme file included for documentation.

References.Name: System
References.Description: Standard .NET Framework reference required for all C# projects.

References.Name: Autodesk.Inventor.Interop
References.Description: Primary interop assembly for Inventor API. Provides access to Inventor objects and methods from .NET.

COMReferences.Name: stdole
COMReferences.Description: COM reference required for automation and standard OLE types.

AddIn.Explanation: This section defines how Inventor loads and identifies the AddIn.

PostBuildEvent.Description: Copies DLL, .addin, and manifest files to standard AddIns folders for All Users and Current User.

Explanation: This JSON represents the full structure of a standard Autodesk Inventor 2026 AddIn template, including all files, references, COM dependencies, metadata, and post-build copy actions. Ideal for training, documentation, and automated analysis of AddIn projects.
